name: NOA upload tool
title: NOA upload tool
description: Uploads images from open access articles - use the search to find an image, then upload by clicking the >>Upload to Wikimedia<< button.
author: Janko Happe, Lucia Sohmen

name: NOA rand-upload tool
title: NOA random upload tool
description: Finds random images from open access articles and lets users upload them
author: Janko Happe, Lucia Sohmen
